title: RFID and Mixed Reality-Based Technical Education Curriculum: Enhancing Practical Application Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical, work-centered training for professionals, offering experiential learning environments using RFID systems and mixed reality technology. Conducts scenario-based education reflecting real-world industrial cases.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the components and operating principles of RFID systems and mathematically model the data processing workflow.
Learners can simulate real-world applications of RFID technology in mixed reality environments and perform problem-solving procedures.
Learners achieve at least 80% proficiency in designing RFID-based logistics management systems through formative assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
